content: Standard-class general steel cutting disc for everyday use with gas saws AC-D GS General steel cutting disc ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for everyday use - steel cutting disc pairs with gas saws to quickly and easily cut through steel Helps your budget go further - more economical price point helps free up budget for other construction site costs Less time spent reworking - make smoother cuts with greater speed, strength and flexibility the first time Work more safely and comfortably - compliant with the highest safety standards, and ANSI B7.1 and OSA certified Precisely matched to Hilti gas saws - helping to achieve faster, more uniform cuts every time Applications Cutting a wide range of steel base materials with gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Standard Base material: Steel Tool type: Gas saw Technical Data | Product Class | Standard | Base material | Steel | Tool type | Gas saw | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 ### ITEMS- 2374133 - Cutting disc AC-D 12x5/32x1 ST P - Package Size 10 pc - 2374134 - Cutting disc AC-D 12x5/32x20 ST P - Package Size 10 pc - 2374135 - Cutting disc AC-D 14x5/32x1 ST P - Package Size 10 pc - 2374136 - Cutting disc AC-D 14x5/32x20 ST P - Package Size 10 pc
